name: Pixel Theft
description:
A practice project I made in gamemaker, there are still features I feel should be added such as achievements and shops but I don't have much time at the moment to work on this, I thought I might aswell upload it anyway.

hope you have fun :P

- controls are : WASD to move, SPACE to shoot, Q to drop/pick up weapons, E to enter and exit vehicles.

phone (press UP to open, LEFT is back, RIGHT to switch selection, DOWN to buy) is still not quite implemented also items require money to buy: pizza is 10 coins, airstrike is 20 coins, combine harvester is 20, boat is 10.
